sense.definition: in, into, or across the space separating (two objects or regions) (e.g., between the house and the garage)
in the period separating (two points in time) (e.g., between May and July)
in the interval separating (two points on a scale / in a series) (e.g., between N and Z)
indicating a connection, interaction, or relationship involving two or more things (e.g., discussion between the two factions)
with reference to decision-making processes involving two or more things being considered together/against each other, as with choices or the discernment of differences (e.g., choose between them)
with reference to a contrast or failure to correspond (e.g., the difference between them)
by combining (or summing over as in arithmetic) the resources or actions of (two or more things) (e.g., between the two of them, they own 50% of the city)
